text: Notice how he has numbered the blue veins%% in my breast. Moreover there are ten freckles.
in my breast. Moreover there are ten freckles. Now he goes left. Now he goes right.
Now he goes left. Now he goes right. He is building a city, a city of flesh.
He is building a city, a city of flesh. He's an industrialist. He has starved in cellars
He's an industrialist. He has starved in cellars%% and, ladies and gentlemen, he's been broken by iron,
and, ladies and gentlemen, he's been broken by iron, by the blood, by the metal, by the triumphant
by the blood, by the metal, by the triumphant%% iron of his mother's death. But he begins again.
iron of his mother's death. But he begins again. Now he constructs me. He is consumed by the city.
Now he constructs me. He is consumed by the city. From the glory of words he has built me up.
From the glory of words he has built me up. From the wonder of concrete he has molded me.
From the wonder of concrete he has molded me. He has given me six hundred street signs.
He has given me six hundred street signs. The time I was dancing he built a museum.
The time I was dancing he built a museum. He built ten blocks when I moved on the bed.
He built ten blocks when I moved on the bed. He constructed an overpass when I left.
He constructed an overpass when I left. I gave him flowers and he built an airport.
I gave him flowers and he built an airport. For traffic lights he handed at red and green
For traffic lights he handed at red and green%% lollipops. Yet in my heart I am go children slow.
